  • Classes in rajawali.materials.shaders used by rajawali.materials.methods 
    Class and Description
    AShaderBase.DataType
    This enum contains a mapping to GLSL data types names.
    AShaderBase.IGlobalShaderVar
    Shader variables map to variable names that will be used in shaders.
    IShaderFragment 
  • Classes in rajawali.materials.shaders used by rajawali.materials.plugins 
    Class and Description
    AShader
    This class is a wrapper class for shader creation.
    AShaderBase
    This abstract class defines all the data types that are used in a shader.
    AShaderBase.DataType
    This enum contains a mapping to GLSL data types names.
    AShaderBase.IGlobalShaderVar
    Shader variables map to variable names that will be used in shaders.
    AShaderBase.RFloat
    Defines a floating point data type.
    AShaderBase.RVec2
    Defines a 2 component vector of floats.
    IShaderFragment 
  • Classes in rajawali.materials.shaders used by rajawali.materials.shaders 
    Class and Description
    AShader
    This class is a wrapper class for shader creation.
    AShader.ShaderType 
    AShaderBase
    This abstract class defines all the data types that are used in a shader.
    AShaderBase.DataType
    This enum contains a mapping to GLSL data types names.
    AShaderBase.DefaultShaderVar
    The default shader variables are used in the default vertex and fragment shader.
    AShaderBase.GLFragColor
    Defines the color of the current fragment.
    AShaderBase.GLPosition
    Defines the position of the current vertex.
    AShaderBase.IGlobalShaderVar
    Shader variables map to variable names that will be used in shaders.
    AShaderBase.Precision
    Precision qualifier.
    AShaderBase.RFloat
    Defines a floating point data type.
    AShaderBase.RMat3
    Defines a 3x3 matrix.
    AShaderBase.RMat4
    Defines a 4x4 matrix.
    AShaderBase.RSampler2D
    Defines a type that represents a 2D texture bound to the OpenGL context.
    AShaderBase.RVec2
    Defines a 2 component vector of floats.
    AShaderBase.RVec3
    Defines a 3 component vector of floats.
    AShaderBase.RVec4
    Defines a 4 component vector of floats.
    AShaderBase.ShaderVar
    A ShaderVar is a wrapper class for a GLSL variable.
    IShaderFragment

  • Classes in rajawali.materials.shaders used by rajawali.materials.shaders.fragments.texture 
    Class and Description
    AShader
    This class is a wrapper class for shader creation.
    AShaderBase
    This abstract class defines all the data types that are used in a shader.
    AShaderBase.RFloat
    Defines a floating point data type.
    AShaderBase.RSampler2D
    Defines a type that represents a 2D texture bound to the OpenGL context.
    AShaderBase.RSamplerCube
    Defines a type that represents a cubic texture.
    AShaderBase.RSamplerExternalOES
    Defines a type that provides a mechanism for creating EGLImage texture targets from EGLImages.
    AShaderBase.RVec2
    Defines a 2 component vector of floats.
    IShaderFragment
